posts.post_content:
I didn't manage to draw the god hand in my cube draft, but the mere potential of it was glorious.  
  
\* Turn 1 forest, [Boreal Druid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boreal Druid) or [Elves of Deep Shadow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elves of Deep Shadow)  
\* Turn 2 forest, [Priestess of Titania](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Priestess of Titania), this  
\* Turn 3 tap everything, untap the priestess with this, replay and tap forest, [Artisan of Kozilek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Artisan of Kozilek)  
  
I love cube draft.
posts.html:
I didn't manage to draw the god hand in my cube draft, but the mere potential of it was glorious.

* Turn 1 forest, Boreal Druid or Elves of Deep Shadow
* Turn 2 forest, Priestess of Titania, this
* Turn 3 tap everything, untap the priestess with this, replay and tap forest, Artisan of Kozilek

I love cube draft.
